scripts.lint: echo '\x1b[33mExecuting lint in react application...\x1b[0m' && cd web/ && npm run lint && echo '\x1b[1;32mLinter executed successfully!\x1b[0m'
scripts.install-web-dependencies: echo '\x1b[1;33mInstalling Web Dependencies..\x1b[0m' && cd web/ && npm install
scripts.start-dev-web: echo '\x1b[1;96mStarting Web dev environment\n\x1b[0m' && cd web/ && npm run dev
scripts.install-strapi-dependencies: echo '\x1b[1;33mInstalling Strapi Dependencies..\x1b[0m' && cd strapi/ && npm install
scripts.start-dev-strapi: echo '\x1b[1;96mStarting Strapi dev environment\n\x1b[0m' && cd strapi/ && npm run develop
scripts.dev: echo '\x1b[1;96mStarting Piano Duo dev environment\n\x1b[0m' && npm run start-dev-web & npm run start-dev-strapi
scripts.configure-dev-environment: echo '\x1b[1;96mCreating Piano Duo dev environment\n\x1b[0m' && npm install && npm run prepare && npm run install-web-dependencies && npm run install-strapi-dependencies && echo '\x1b[1;32mDev environment created successfully!\x1b[0m'
